text: Rev. Juuso Niilonga Shikongo (born in 1917 in Iihongo, Onyaanya Constituency) was a Namibian teacher, priest, activist and notable public servant, he is well-known for having risked his life on several occasions for the welfare of his community and the Independence of Namibia. Rev. Juuso Shikongo Secondary School was established and named in his honour ==References== Category:1917 births Category:1991 deaths Category:People from Oshikoto Region Category:Ovambo people Category:History of Namibia Category:South West African anti-apartheid activists Category:Namibian priests
title: Juuso Shikongo
